@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB I'm praying 24hours god for Prime minister Narendra Modiji and home minister Amit Shahji has to live 100000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000 crores of years in the world because they always motivational,inspirational,great,super and one of the best human being in world

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB @covid19indiaorg @MantralayaRoom @PMOIndia @AUThackeray 
Only 10.22 lakh tests ? Please increase . Today we should see between 9k and 14k cases with a possible high of 18k cases . Recovery is now at 98.54% and Positivity is at 4.28% for February and 5.6% overall . https://t.co/QWAAEYTrG0

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB 10273 केस आए रोजाना पांच करोड़ टेस्ट कर पूरे महीने में पूरे भारत की टेस्टिंग कर इस बेहद खतरनाक महामारी को खत्म कर लोगो की जान बचाना चाहिए एक महीने में ही भारत से करोना खत्म हो सकता है सभी की लाइन लगाकर करो जांच चाहे बीमारी ना निकले लेकिन जांच होना सभी की बेहद जरूरी है

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB Using free app Bost, you can safely and easily connecte with people at same location. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/UJeGB9maoD
